responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: Can you tell me about the registration?
responses: To register at the Open University of Sri Lanka, visit the registration section on our official website and follow the instructions provided.

patterns: When can I add or drop courses?
Tell me about the add/drop period at OUSL
How to add or drop courses?
responses: The add/drop period at the Open University of Sri Lanka allows you to modify your course enrollments. Please check the academic calendar on our website for specific dates and procedures.
